meaning: use, send on a mission, order, messenger, envoy, ambassador, cause

onyomiExamples.meaning: messenger, police and judicial chief (Heian and Kamakura periods), klesha (polluting thoughts such as greed, hatred and delusion, which result in suffering)

kunyomiExamples.meaning: to use (a thing, method, etc.), to make use of, to put to use, to use (a person, animal, puppet, etc.), to employ, to handle, to manage, to manipulate, to use (time, money, etc.), to spend, to consume, to use (language), to speak
errand, mission, going as envoy, messenger, bearer, errand boy, errand girl, familiar spirit, use, usage, user, trainer, tamer, charmer
way to use something, treatment, management (of help)
Japanese bush warbler, messenger of spring
